overview: A documentary/roadmovie about the trip that Jón Páll and Fjölnir, two of the best tattoo-artists in Iceland, took on motorcycles to the Faroe Islands in the summer of 2009. They opened a tattoo-shop in Klaksvik in the Faroes as a way to get to know the natives and their customs in a more personal and intimate way. They visited the local people, went to festivals and tried Faroen customs. A film about motorcycles, music, tattoos and the Faroes – where Rock’n Roll meets folk traditions!
title: Tattoo Iceland
